doctor.name: Prof. Dr. Md. Jalal Uddin
doctor.specialty: Neurology (Brain, Nerve, Spine, Headache, Backpain) Specialist
doctor.info: Prof. Dr. Md. Jalal Uddin is a Neurologist in Mymensingh. His qualification is MBBS, DPH, MD (Neurology), MACP (USA). He is a Former Professor & Head, Neurology Department at Mymensingh Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Nexus Hospital, Mymensingh. Practicing hour of Prof. Dr. Md. Jalal Uddin at Nexus Hospital, Mymensingh is 3pm to 9pm (Closed: Friday).
